name: Auntychristos maze
description:
its simple -- solve the maze  in 30 minuts or less to get a prize (300$ ) only one winner per month 

the rules inside the game --that u have to take screenshot for the password that will show up after you finish and send it to the Email that gonna be under the password

actully im new developer and have no good laptop or money to continue my education so it will be helpfully for you and for me if you buy it
